casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Larry Anthony FINNEY. No. 93P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. David G. Belser, Joel B. Stevenson, Asheville, for Larry Anthony Finney. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

The Attorney General's petition for discretionary review is allowed for the limited purpose of remanding this case to the Court of Appeals for consideration in light of the decisions of this Court in State v. Blackwell, 361 N.C. 41 , 638 S.E.2d 452 (2006), and State v. Hurt, 361 N.C. 325 , 643 S.E.2d 915 (2007).

By order of the Court in Conference, this 3rd day of May, 2007.
